listAsq.title: What kind of motorcycles do you buy?
listAsq.content: Absolutely any: motorcycles, mopeds, scooters, motorcycles, ATVs. Mark, year of manufacture, mileage, condition do not matter. We buy out credit, as well as with fines. We work with individuals and legal entities, buy out corporate motoparks.

listAsq.title: Can I leave the bike for you to sell?
listAsq.content: Yes. We will put your motorized vehicle on commission at our showroom.

listAsq.title: You're buying up undocumented?
listAsq.content: Yes, we do. We accept motorcycles without documents and in any condition. We will pick up faulty transportation from anywhere in Kiev and Ukraine.

listAsq.title: What kind of information do you need?
listAsq.content: Before the sale, be prepared to provide the following information about your vehicle: make, model, VIN or frame number, year of manufacture on the PTS, the name of the organization (issued the PTS), whether it was registered ON YOU, as the owner of the motorcycle, mileage, your assessment of the condition of the engine and gearbox, what parts are painted or replaced by non-original, whether some tuning is installed.

listAsq.title: I want to sell for as much as possible!
listAsq.content: To increase the buyback price by 10%, wash the motorcycle, bring a second set of tires and keys. In 90% of cases, the valuation will be higher than other motorcycle buybacks.

listAsq.title: I'll sell the scooter for more!
listAsq.content: No problem! We just want to save you from wasting your time. Pre-sale preparation, photo shoots, registration on profile sites, paying for advertisements, answering the phone and traveling to meetings at inconvenient times - this is the least you will have to face.

listBottom1.title: Urgent buyout of cars with mileage
listBottom1.text:
During the existence of the company, we have bought out a large number of used vehicles of different makes and models. We have learned to approach the issues of car buyout with intelligence: cars are de-registered, and all transactions are legally correct.

We offer car buying services in all districts of Kiev (Kiev region) and Ukraine. Those who do not want to spend time and effort to find a client, it is better to use the service 'auto buyout. Of course you will not get the maximum value for the car, but 90-95% of the market value we guarantee you!

However, if you decide to sell a used car on your own, it is recommended to be patient. Selling a car on your own can take months. At the same time, without understanding the market, it is difficult to set a price that will suit both you and the potential buyer. As a result, you will waste your time and efforts.

listBottom2.title: Buying trailers in Kiev
listBottom2.text: Everything is simple! Send us a photo of the vehicle in a convenient messenger (viber, telegram, instagram). Within 4-5 minutes, the appraiser Vladimir will write the cost of redemption. Having come to an agreement, we will immediately go to you! That you would not have traveled in vain, we will come to you ourselves, absolutely free, without any claims if you refuse our services. We value the reputation and time of our customers!
